reviews.text: Extremely fast and friendly service. Food was good. I recommend the honey lemon pancakes, and the satay was some of the best I've had. Also free wifi until 11pm and a great place to watch sports.

The food is very bad. It's totally not matching the menu. The Thai selection is not even near what a Thai food is. Couldn't eat at all what I ordered. Returned it all back. Still I got charged. In the menu is mentioned that taxes are included, but in the bill the taxes came up. Totally don't advise this place to anyone.

Good value and quit tasty. The chicken satay was cooked well and juicy with char on the outside complemented by a flavorful peanut satay sauce. The fish satay combo had a generous serving, with a good balance on flavor with a sweet and sour sauce on the tuna skewers. Mixed fruit juice was only 15, 000! Altogether the meal was less then 10 dollars cad. Filling and delicious.

My favourite Warung in poppies 2! Great prices, big portions , delicious and the service is good. Came here the second year and it was as good as I remembered. Came twice with picky people and both enjoyed their food. Will be back :))

they provide lot of menus, food, and drinks. The place located inside small street. accessible with motorcycle and by walk. the price is suitable. The place is comfortable and we could chit-chat with friend, or take away the food. The staffs have good attitude and manner. I really want to go back again
Tasty and cheap! The staff are also very friendly. It isn't the cleanest place though, but the fruit juices and local dishes are worth the risk 😋

Super good place. Friendly staff, very good value for money, me and my partner loaded up out plate with tasty vegetables of many variations as well as tempeh and it was a mere 20,000 rupiah. Everything is delicious and there are fantastic smoothies. I am very much looking forward to returning.

An old reasonably priced favorite place. I've been coming here for years. Asian, Western(steaks), vegan meals catered for. Daily specials. I sit at the outside tables and watch the busy Poppies street scene.
Very poor service. Table of six and they completely forgot my order. The staff were screaming at a rat running across the floor. A shambles of a restaurant.
Cheap eats, dont be fooled by the appearance, always hard to get a table, no taxes applied to bill

Good food, quite cheap and friendly staff..
Oh and nice place to eat and relax..
local prices.... perfect meal sizes.... great food and service

Website is inaccurate! There is no dancing on Friday night, and the times are completely different than listed on the website. The manager didn't understand why it's important to update the website, despite my grievances/attempts to explain to him that people make plans (we came here on a date expecting to salsa dance). Don't bother with the RSVP function (they never replied to me).

Food was terrible. They put their girls out like a massage  Havana = Cuba, but they're serving tacos, burritos, etc...this should not be a place you "plan" to visit, rather if you're near and you want to sit/drink, probably OK for one mixed rum drink. Not recommended. Also, the bathroom sink broke from pressure and water shot up everywhere. Absolutely disgusting.
Good food at reasonable prices. Absolutely awesome spit in the lane too. Separate from all the congestion but still in the middle of all the action.

The best Mexican in Bali, and I have eaten at many restaurants over the past 10 years and this is on the top of my list. Check out all the happy hour specials they have and entertainment. 
Who can go past a glass of sangria for $3 
AMAZING

Very friendly staff, decent food for a reasonable amount of money. Would recommend! It's only 4 star because we were the only guests at the time of visiting - I bet the atmosphere is top in the evening hours.

We love coming back to Havana's when in Bali. Husband loves the ribs. We were disappointed tonight husband ordered the ribs & came out 1/4 of the size they use to be & potatoes were cold. We had pasta dishes taste nice but very small portion. Only thing that hasn't changed was the daiquiri.
Big disappointment

DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS PLACE THEY WILL SCAM YOU! 
Ordered a burrito and burrito bowl off of GOJEK delivery from here and the resturant literally doubled the price on us. The driver gave us the receipt. 

The burrito bowl was super tiny and the burrito was soggy and flavorless. Save yourself the trouble

Great restaurant! 
Extremely fresh food and staff is really cool!
One of my favorites in Bali!
Setting was a bit rural but they had very good food for a good price. Both of us ordered chicken quesadilla :)

It was terrible. The carne (beef) nachos was basically a tasteless bit of diced stesk on top of deep fried oily corn chips topped with salad and a bit of avocado and beans. All the ingredients were correct but there was no taste and no love. Staff were good and the prices were low but deservedly so. Definately won't go back. My husband had the tacos which were exactly the same but in a different shell. We both left 90% of our meal on our plates. One positive was the beer was really cold.

Ordered via delivery. Price was literally double what was stated via go food and driver had no invoice. I can understand small differences but this was a joke. Burrito was terrible with no guac or sour cream, 90% rice. Tried calling the number to query the price difference but it's not in service. Avoid this scam restaurant and get great burritos at taco beach or lacalaca.
Place is quiet nice. Foods are excellent and good served. Staffs are nice too. Overall is good.

I am sorry to say this. But this was a disaster. Aweful food which made me sick later on. Maybe they were good once but they could not satisfy me. Never again. After I ate at this place I completely stopped eating any traditional dishes in Bali. I still get sick if I think about the taste.
Good food  good place

This is definitely not the best indo food around. It's barely average. Drinks were terrible and for two meals and two drinks with tax and service it was 345,000. Very expensive for average food. Don't forget, you'll be sitting around smokers as well.
Average taste. Place is not bad

The food was good but nothing amazing. Having said that it was quite cheap so I'm not complaining. Definitely good value. Would have been better if it was a bit spicier. The only real issue was that there is no outdoor seating as is the case with may restaurants in Bali.

I thought this place was quite interesting. The food is a good Western Balinese mix of various Mexican dishes.
However this easily beats anything I can get in my home village. As such I was more than happy with what I was served.
The staff were very friendly and efficient without being obtrusive.
Give it a whirl, overall it is a great
 place.

Nice place to eat mexican food. Open space, fresh air, friendly staff. 
We tried the 2 kilos burrito, delicious but too big challenge for two of us :)

We were served by Sari for the duration of our stay and she is the absolute most beautiful person we have ever met. You wouldn’t find somebody more special then Sari. The food and drink is just an impeccable as the service 😊
Great food and excellent service from Pitri she always had a big smile on her face and very friendly. Couldnt fault the service thanks Pitri.

I can’t believe this place got 4.5 stars. Avoid! Although the food presentation looks good, it tastes terrible. The lobster bisque was sour, all tastes were off. The restaurant itself is nice for outdoor dinning but be prepared for a lot of mosquitos. I wouldn’t come back or recommend this restaurant.
Beautiful restaurant with amazing service. We loved the food and enjoyed the atmosphere right at the beach. Prices are according to the quality :)
The food is very awesome!!!!!!!! The staffs are friendly and helpful. What I love the most is the ambience. You can choose to be seated on the beach, while watching the sunset. It's so romantic.
very beautiful place! beachfront and the beach so clean compare to the other hotel or property! Love the ambience and the food

I can't explain in words how much I liked this place. We arrived today morning and tired like hell but the moment we saw the beach view by this hotel restaurant we forgot everything. Place is very nice specially for couples. You can sit in your separate shags and enjoy food and drinks lying on resting chairs. Also, you can try the water activities here, Kuta beach is very near to this place and airport is like 2 km so, in short you have everything like a package 😎
